Name: carbon dioxide production, liquid | carbon dioxide, liquid | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Extraction of carbon dioxide out of waste gas streams from different production processes with a 15-20% monoethanolamine (MEA) solution, followed by a purification and a liquefaction step, each using electricity as energy source.;Reference(s): ;Althaus H.-J., Chudacoff M., Hischier R., Jungbluth N., Osses M. and Primas A. (2007) Life Cycle Inventories of Chemicals. ecoinvent report No. 8, v2.0. EMPA Dübendorf, Swiss Centre for Life Cycle Inventories, Dübendorf, CH.
